fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Regional Policy, Transport
head_office_address: Enterprise House Melburne Park Vicarage Road
industry_forums: We anticipate future, participation, but do not currently have any active participation.
inter_groups: We anticipate future, participation, but do not currently have any active participation.
eu_initiatives: Enterprise has business interests across a broad range of policy areas, including but not limited to:  Transportation; Consumer Law; Competition; Digital Single Market; Employment Law; and Insurance.  Initiatives currently being followed include:  Cross-border vehicle registration; the public consultation and forthcoming initiative on the regulatory environment for platforms, online intermediaries, data and cloud computing and the collaborative economy; Road Package; Package Travel Directive; EU Data Protection Package; Safe Harbour framework; and e-Privacy Directive revisions.
organisation_name: Enterprise Rent A Car UK, Ltd. (Enterprise)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: No specific activities at this time.
goals__remit: Enterprise Rent-A-Car UK, Ltd. is the wholly owned subsidiary of Enterprise Holdings, Inc. which owns and operates the Enterprise Rent-A-Car, National Car Rental, and Alamo Rent A Car brands across the globe.  Enterprise intends to engage in government affairs activities in the European Union with the goal of ensuring our company's continued ability to provide opportunities for our employees and valued services for our customers across Europe.  We aim to add value to the policy making process by engaging in those areas that impact our employees and customers.  As an industry leader, we believe our engagement in the shaping of EU policy will benefit consumers across Europe.
